Michael John Kricfalusi (; born September 9, 1955), known professionally as John K., is a Canadian blogger, former animator and voice actor. He is best known for creating the Nickelodeon animated television series "The Ren & Stimpy Show", voicing Ren in the show. He was born in Chicoutimi, Quebec.
In 2018, Kricfalusi was accused sexually abusing underage girls in the late 1990s. Kricfalusi released an apology for his behavior, blaming his bipolar disorder.
